questions.question: What is the primary goal of Manual Lymphatic Drainage (MLD) for the lower body?
choices: To stimulate lymph flow and reduce swelling
questions.answer: To stimulate lymph flow and reduce swelling

questions.question: Which of the following is a common lymphatic issue in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Lymphatic filariasis

questions.question: What is the correct pressure to be applied during MLD techniques?
questions.answer: Light pressure

questions.question: In what direction should MLD strokes be applied?
questions.answer: From distal to proximal areas

questions.question: Which area is typically treated first in MLD for the lower body?
questions.answer: Upper thighs and groin

questions.question: What is a major challenge in performing MLD in tropical climates like Timor-Leste?
choices: Increased risk of infection due to humidity
questions.answer: Increased risk of infection due to humidity

questions.question: How should MLD techniques be adapted for tropical climates?
choices: By emphasizing hygiene and using antimicrobial lotions
By avoiding treatment of the feet
questions.answer: By emphasizing hygiene and using antimicrobial lotions

questions.question: What is lymphedema?
choices: Swelling caused by a buildup of lymph fluid in body tissues
A bacterial infection of the lymphatic system
questions.answer: Swelling caused by a buildup of lymph fluid in body tissues

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical step in the MLD sequence for the leg?
choices: Stationary circles at groin lymph nodes
Deep tissue massage of the calf muscles
questions.answer: Deep tissue massage of the calf muscles

questions.question: What is the purpose of performing stationary circles at the popliteal fossa?
choices: To increase blood flow to the area
To stimulate lymph nodes behind the knee
questions.answer: To stimulate lymph nodes behind the knee

questions.question: How can MLD be integrated with traditional Timorese healing practices?
choices: By combining MLD with local herbal remedies and respecting cultural beliefs
By only using MLD on non-Timorese patients
questions.answer: By combining MLD with local herbal remedies and respecting cultural beliefs

questions.question: What is an important consideration when treating the lower body in Timor-Leste?
choices: Encouraging patients to wear tight clothing
questions.answer: Respecting modesty and cultural norms

questions.question: Which of the following is a symptom of chronic venous insufficiency?
questions.answer: Skin changes and ulcers

questions.question: What is filariasis?
choices: A parasitic disease affecting the lymphatic system
questions.answer: A parasitic disease affecting the lymphatic system

questions.question: How should MLD be adapted for patients with filariasis?
choices: By focusing only on unaffected areas
By using gentler techniques and considering antiparasitic treatments
questions.answer: By using gentler techniques and considering antiparasitic treatments

questions.question: What type of clothing is recommended for patients with lower body lymphedema in tropical climates?
questions.answer: Breathable, moisture-wicking fabrics

questions.question: What is the role of compression garments in managing lower body lymphedema?
choices: To maintain the benefits of MLD between sessions
questions.answer: To maintain the benefits of MLD between sessions

questions.question: How often should MLD treatments be performed in tropical climates?
choices: Less frequently than in cooler climates
The same frequency as in cooler climates
More frequently due to climate challenges
questions.answer: More frequently due to climate challenges

questions.question: What is an important self-care instruction for patients with lower body lymphedema?
choices: Keep the affected limb in a dependent position
Apply heat to the swollen areas
questions.answer: Practice elevation techniques at home

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical cause of lower body lymphedema in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Frostbite

questions.question: What is the primary function of the lymphatic system?
choices: To maintain fluid balance and support immune function
questions.answer: To maintain fluid balance and support immune function

questions.question: How should a therapist approach cultural beliefs about swelling during treatment?
choices: Respect them while providing education on MLD benefits
questions.answer: Respect them while providing education on MLD benefits

questions.question: What is a potential benefit of integrating MLD with traditional Timorese massage methods?
choices: It increases the cost of treatment
It creates a synergistic approach to healing
It replaces the need for MLD entirely
questions.answer: It creates a synergistic approach to healing

questions.question: Which of the following is an important aspect of skin care for patients with lower body lymphedema?
choices: Proper moisturizing and inspection for cuts or infections
Applying tight bandages to reduce swelling
questions.answer: Proper moisturizing and inspection for cuts or infections

questions.question: What is the purpose of the preparatory stationary circles at the groin lymph nodes?
choices: To increase blood flow to the legs
questions.answer: To clear proximal lymph pathways

questions.question: How should MLD techniques be modified for patients with acute infections?
choices: Use more pressure to clear the infection
Avoid treatment until the infection clears
Focus only on the infected area
Use the same techniques as for non-infected patients
questions.answer: Avoid treatment until the infection clears

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for involving family members in lymphedema care?
choices: Exclude family members from all aspects of care
Allow family members to perform MLD without training
Involve family in decision-making and teach them appropriate self-care techniques
Only involve family members if the patient is a minor
questions.answer: Involve family in decision-making and teach them appropriate self-care techniques

questions.question: Which of the following is a correct technique for foot drainage in MLD?
choices: Using deep pressure on the sole of the foot
Avoiding touch on the top of the foot
Using the thumb to make small circles on the sole of the foot
questions.answer: Using the thumb to make small circles on the sole of the foot

questions.question: What is the primary concern when adapting MLD techniques for patients with filariasis?
choices: Reducing the effectiveness of antiparasitic medications
questions.answer: Spreading the parasitic infection

questions.question: How can healthcare providers in Timor-Leste promote lymphatic health beyond individual MLD treatments?
choices: By focusing only on medication-based treatments
By conducting community health education events on lymphatic health
By recommending bed rest for all patients with swelling
questions.answer: By conducting community health education events on lymphatic health
